feed.title: Good Hope Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Good Hope Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 7:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
